name: Guilherme Bernardo da Nóbrega
title: Full Stack Web Developer and Project Manager
aboutMe: Full Stack Web Developer, with an emphasis on Front-end and project leader with proven proficiency in agile methodologies and a passion for technological innovation that add great value with fast delivery of results, meeting excellent deadlines. I stand out in creating dynamic web applications using advanced stacks - HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.JS, React, VTEX, among many others. My difference lies in the ability to transform complex ideas into intuitive and maintainable web systems, ensuring an exceptional user experience and the necessary scalability for long-term business success. With a track record of leading my own ventures, I demonstrate not only technical but also strategic vision and effective team management, resulting in high-impact deliveries. Meticulous documentation and software architecture are the backbone core of my work, ensuring solutions that exceed expectations and support continuous growth. Furthermore, I have advanced English, with fluent listening and speaking in accelerated development, allowing me excellent collaborations in international environments and adaptability to different technological cultures.

projects.name: Kenzie Hub
projects.description: Login interface and user profile MVP.

projects.name: API Monday - Virtual Assistant
projects.description: The purpose of this project is to create a means of interaction between a database and a FrontEnd application based on a virtual assistant.

projects.name: Monday VA
projects.description: User interface that consumes data from the created API.

managementHistory: Event and Culture Producer at Sistema Fator de Ensino

softSkills.title: Humanism
softSkills.text: Committed to creating meaningful work that benefits people. I believe that technology should be used to improve the quality of life and the human experience.

softSkills.title: Research and Development
softSkills.text: Passionate about research and development, always looking for new ways to solve problems or optimize existing solutions.

softSkills.title: Modeling and Management
softSkills.text: Effective modeling and management skills, optimizing processes and enhancing team collaboration.

softSkills.title: Communication and Maintenance of Corporate Culture
softSkills.text: Promoting meaningful collaboration and fostering an exceptional work culture.

softSkills.title: Data and Evidence-Based Actions
softSkills.text: Data-driven approach to problem solving and decision making.

softSkills.title: Complex, Critical, Holistic, and Procedural Vision
softSkills.text: Ability to address complex problems with critical and holistic thinking, maintaining a process-oriented perspective.

softSkills.title: Customer-Oriented Market Vision
softSkills.text: Customer-oriented mindset, committed to solving their problems and meeting their needs.

testimonials.name: Alexandre Borges de Albuquerque
testimonials.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
testimonials.text: I had the honor of developing with Guilherme on a group project we participated in. With his entrepreneurial profile, Guilherme does not shy away from challenges, looks for new challenges and when he encounters a barrier, he uses his creativity and resilience to overcome problems. The team that has Guilherme as a participant will not worry about the comfort zone as he himself does not conform, always looking for a problem to solve with proactivity, creativity, and A LOT of dedication.

testimonials.name: Álvaro Alencar
testimonials.title: Full Stack Engineer
testimonials.text: Highly organized professional with excellent communication skills.
